name: Fuse5
description:
Fuse5 is a new matching puzzle game from the creators of Omino!

Fuse two or more items to create a superior one. Matching five times you will get a shiny star. Collect the most number of them and become the master of the universe; well, the game!

FEATURES

Fuse5 features 3 GAMEPLAY MODES:

* Play the Endless Classic Mode to relax and unwind.
* Play the Arcade Mode for more excitement with bombs and coins.
* Play the Quest Mode to conquer the map.

Fuse5 is a fun brain teaser to relax and enjoy your time while unwinding, commuting or waiting for the next big thing. Have Fun!
